We all have our own beliefs. I make no judgements on the living or the dead=
.. I just communicate and record. I am an Empath, not a priest. Many,many s=
pirits have asked me for help. If they can help themselves, they do not see=
m to know how. The prisoners believe that they would be trapped. if they di=
ed there. Are they imprisoned by their own beliefs?
Steve




_____________=
___________________
From: April Abercrombie <april@abercrombieghostresearch=
.com>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, May 27, 2009 5:58:19 PM
=
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Ghost Box Demo at Moundsville WV





In a way, I ag=
ree. "Stuck" implies accidental. If a ghost is hanging around, it there by =
choice, whether it is fully aware of that or not.
=A0
----- Original Messag=
e ----- 
From: Frank Sumption 
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 
Sent: Wednesda=
y, May 27, 2009 3:55 PM
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Ghost Box Demo at Moundsvill=
e WV

=A0I don't believe in trapped/lost souls, I think that's Hollywood.=
=A0The trouble with doing investigations, I think, is you get the evidence =
you expect to get, so it will tend to support the concept of stuck souls. W=
hen I record it supports my concept of sprits travel, and hauntings are for=
 show. Which is correct?--both at one time or another. 

=A0I did a recordi=
ng at lunch time, at home, and in it a voice says "ghost--right behind you"=
. I was recording open air with the test board running.=A0 

=A0Frank-S


O=
n Wed, May 27, 2009 at 1:54 PM, <SnowfireL@aol. com> wrote:

Well, stand outside the thing, and help those po=
or souls out, here they are making money at the cost of lost souls who are =
asking for help.=A0 Shame on them, don't they realize =A0how many lost soul=
s there are out there, waiting, go back (a few thousand years worth of them=
,)=A0 were I to name all the tribes, country, religions, throughout the yea=
rs, people that died trapped, in various places over century's, and yes the=
re are thousand's of them in the world, just dwelling in a cell of their ow=
n making, no progression, no light, no hope, without people they love, and =
who=A0wait still loving them, they exist in these dark places without God.=
=A0 This mission should be to help them get back to God, back to the light =
of God, light of Universe however, we want to call it, but in that light is=
 love and happiness.=A0 Just my take, sf

In a message dated 5/27/2009 3:42=
:33 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time, foreverhaunted57@ yahoo.com writes:



Yes,=
 you need special permission. I was there for an all night ghost hunt as a =
guest of Eastern Paranormal. The place can be rented at night but believe m=
e when I say "it ain't cheap". Plus I don't think the prison would apprecia=
te me=A0releasing the inmates=A0before their eternal sentence has been serv=
ed.
Steve

Does one need special permission to =

them already know you Steve, this is Steve?=A0 Right?=A0 sf

In a message d=
ated 5/27/2009 2:15:10 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time, foreverhaunted57@ yahoo.=
com writes:



Unfortunately I did not get to attempt to cross them. After =
my demonstration, another group that was also there started complaining tha=
t the box made too much noise and was hendering their investigation so I tu=
rned it off. I wouldn't want my direct=A0communication with the deceased in=
mates to mess up their EVP work, now would I? I apoligized and put it away =
for the rest of the night.
=A0According to the prison staff, the inmates fi=
rmly believed that if they died in prison their souls would be forever=A0tr=
apped there. This belief was so strong that the prison officials would take=
 the elderly inmates who were dying of natural causes to=A0a=A0local hospit=
al so they would'nt have to die in the prison. Maybe their beliefs were wel=
l founded. =A0=A0=A0

hey can start to work on making up for things on the other side.=A0 You fol=
ks should go up there again, and hold a small prayer vigil for them, of cou=
rse they would no longer be ghosts trapped there, but there are plenty more=
 around. sf

In a message dated 5/27/2009 12:10:56 P.M. Eastern Daylight Ti=
me, foreverhaunted57@ yahoo.com writes:



I was invited to spend the night=
 in the West Virginia Penitentiary this past weekend.. I was asked to give =
a short demonstration with my Optimus 12-797 hacked radio. Deep inside the =
prison surrounded by concrete and steel, the radio could not pick up any ra=
dio stations in manual mode. I wasn't sure how this might effect the demons=
tration. I was pleasantly surprised with the results. I recorded the sessio=
n and the results can be heard at this link. http://www.youtube. com/watch?=
 v=3DKwDYu4RULlk
